Content: Parliamentarian, Venerable Athuraliye Rathana Thera stated that if the leaders of the main political parties can come into an agreement, the country can be developed in 3 years. The first assembly of the Sri Lanka Jathika Maha Sabha convened by Venerable Athuraliye Rathana Thera, was held today at the Sadaham Sevana Dharmayathana in Rajagiriya. The assembly was convened with the intention of formulating a national policy on developing the country. Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa, former minister Basil Rajapaksa as well as UNP parliamentarian Wasantha Senanayake took part in the assembly. Our correspondents stated that a discussion was held between the Prime Minister and Venerable Athuraliye Rathana Thera. The Sustainable National Policy publication of the Sri Lanka Jathika Maha Sabha has also been presented to the Prime Minister.
